titles: [Bedlam schoolman. Or, some lines made by an English noble man, that was in Bedlam]. To a delectable new tune.
publisher: Printed by F. Coles, T. Vere and [I.] Wright,
notes: Year of publication from Wing CD-ROM, 1996.
Printed in four columns, with two woodcuts above the first two columns.
Verse - "Fancy. In a melancholly fancy our of my self,".
Identified as Wing B1674B on reel 2545.
Cf. Wing B1674B which does not have an imprint.  This item not in Wing.
O copy, reel 2545, is cropped at head and foot affecting title and imprint. Title supplied by Wing B1674B.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.
